import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ApiService } from 'src/app/service/Api.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-get-complaint-by-client', templateUrl: './get-complaint-by-client.component.html', styleUrls: ['./get-complaint-by-client.component.css'], }) export class GetComplaintByClientComponent { id: String = ''; data: Component = {}; value: boolean = false; constructor(private service: ApiService) {} onSubmit() { this.service.getComplaintByClient(this.id).subscribe((data: any) => { this.value = true; // console.log(data); this.data = data; console.log(this.data); return this.data; }); } }
